about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Word Rave is an exciting word puzzle game that combines strategy, music, and word popping into an experience suited to your playstyle. Whether you’re a fan of puzzling for big solutions in word games or a someone who wants a more casual, high-energy gameplay, Word Rave has something for you.

In Word Rave, you’ll clear out bad letters on a dynamic 3x3 to 6x6 grid while rotating the board until you can form a set of words like making a big crossword. Once you're happy with the lit-up words, you’ll get to clear them in a satisfying “pop” that rewards you for bigger and more words. If you're especially skilled or lucky, you can even keep popping words utilizing the chain bonus for more lucrative high-scores!

The game has two modes to fit any playstyle:

  • Rave Mode: Test your speed and skill with a 3-minute timer as you race to form and pop words for the highest score. The clock is ticking, and the challenge escalates as you try to chain combos and avoid bombs that can end your run early. Can you rack up the highest score before time runs out?

  • Chill Mode: Take your time and play at your own pace in this relaxing yet challenging mode. As the difficulty slowly increases, you’ll need to clear words while avoiding bombs that can explode and end your game. With the option to activate hearts to protect you from bombs and no timer, Chill Mode provides a low-stress environment to strategize and build a high score

Both modes feature high-score tracking, so you can compare your performance with friends and players worldwide. Whether you prefer the rapid pace of Rave or the laid-back challenge of Chill, Word Rave offers hours of fun and rewarding gameplay.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Crossword: Rotate the board to until the it lights up with words like a filled-in crossword, then clear them all in a single satisfying pop!

  • Bombs & Stops: Keep your eye on bombs with a ticking fuse—clear them before they explode! Stops can also fill up your board fast if you don't clear them early

  • Stars: Use stars as wildcards to complete words, and watch your score skyrocket as you score dozens of words with just a single star!

  • Game Modes: Choose between Rave Mode for fast-paced action or Chill Mode for a more strategic, relaxing experience

  • Create & Share: Adjust and save your favorite maps, then show off your high-scores while challenging your friends to beat them using your map settings!

  • Music & Vibes: A catchy, head-bopping soundtrack will keep you grooving as you play. Even your feline guide Mochi will by rocking out to the beat

  • Replayable Challenges: Test your skills by adjusting Rave to be as hard as it gets, or simply try to push further into Chill mode! 

Whether you're here for a thoughtful, relaxing experience or an action-packed score-popping challenge, Word Rave delivers something for everyone

short_description: Don't know a word? Know the whole dictionary? It's Crossword Explosions and huge scoring combos! Shall we pop to the beat? Word Rave brings together fast-paced gameplay and slow, methodical word-crunching into a single, music-filled experience with something for all kinds of players!
